page.title: 06Kennedy Way, Immingham
page.content: Kennedy Way is situated on Pelham Road in the centre of Immingham. By the everyday visitors it is commonly known as "The Precinct" or "The Civic". We asked some people if they regularly visited the sports centre which is but a few seconds walk from the Civic. Out of some 50 people only about 10 visited regularly.Although this result surprised us a little, all the people we asked were adults who were either too busy or not sporty! At one end of the Precinct there is at present an empty unit so we asked the shoppers what they would like to see there.They replied:a boys' clothes shop, book shop, record shop, antique shop or the most popular choice of all; a cafe. (continued)
